#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
        sort(a,a+n);
        int maxi = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;)
        {
            int x = a[i];
            int c = 0;
            while(a[i]==x)
            c++,i++;
            if(c>maxi)
            maxi = c;
        }
        cout<<maxi<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
